segments.text: The kitchen has this warm, inviting feel with the window open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden views make it look so serene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's busy with dishes, concentrated expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ignoring the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing, could ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It might collapse under him any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting, hand out like a beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just ask nicely?
segments.speaker: PAR
